scripts.dev: pnpm build:all && cd modules/example && pnpm dev
scripts.build:extensions: cd modules/extensions && rm -rf dist && tsup src/index.ts  --sourcemap --dts --format esm,cjs,iife --global-name replit
scripts.build:react: cd modules/extensions-react && rm -rf dist && tsup src/index.ts  --sourcemap --dts --format esm,cjs,iife --global-name replit
scripts.publish:extensions: pnpm lint:check && pnpm type:check && cd modules/extensions && npm publish
scripts.publish:react: pnpm lint:check && pnpm type:check && cd modules/extensions-react && npm publish
